item.title: Flutter/Dart - Animations
item.description: Wallet in Flutter This is a fun little project built with Flutter and Firebase that showcases the versatility of these frameworks. Although not in production, this project could easily be transformed into a shopping app with beautiful animations and intuitive navigation.

item.title: Better Forms
item.description: iSurvey Before you ask, this project has not been released in to the world, however I can provide you with demo iOS or Android app.

item.title: Six Sigma - Part Two
item.description: Deneb - VEGA Lite The Power BI out-of-the-box Scatter Plot visual is very good, however it lacks a key feature that I needed to better represent crew actions such as using SVGs.

item.title: Six Sigma - Part One
item.description: Abusing Excel End of 2022, I have been tasked to prepare the forms for Six Sigma time study. After looking at previous similar work, done by my peers, I have realised that it’s a mad man’s job.

item.title: Power Platform
item.description: Onboard Cabin Reports - Power App In December 2021, the Onboard Cabin Report, previously mentioned, got a huge update, the categories have been updated to a 5 level hierarchical taxonomy.

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Onboard Cabin Reports Classification using ML When I joined the Guest Delivery team (now Inflight Service & Hospitality) I’ve encountered the over reliance on Excel. Don’t get me wrong, I love Excel, but people use it wrong all the time.

item.title: Process Improvement
item.description: Note that the data in the chart above is fictional This how I (re)started Although I’ve graduated the IT high school in 2001 as Junior Analyst, Programmer I didn’t pursue a career in the IT world until I have rediscovered my passion for coding when become a Line Manager in 2016.
